description: Spiritual in Lexington, SC. Life Chiropractic & Wellness Center is your local Chiropractor in Lexington serving all of your needs. Call us today at (803) 520-8631 for an appointment.
cleaned_text: Einstein reputedly divided people in two groups, those who believe we live in a friendly universe, and those who don't.
